text: @TNDeptofHealth Don't worry they'll be a vaccine in the third quarter of this year according to Yahoo finance article. Moderna is planning on it. I'm not taking it but how many will because of all theses scary numbers. Good luck and stay safe everyone  https://t.co/HIonMmBwJo
